description.narrative: Staff Costs -Education Development, which contributes to Education â€“ General, Equitable Access To Quality Education. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: 80 per cent of school-aged children (including out-of-school, Internally Displaced Persons (IDPs), refugees, nomadic children, rural girls, children with disabilities) have access to quality basic education
